participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys simple pleasures like music and food.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the who. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. i've a cat named spook.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Sociable and a bit emotional after a recent breakup; loves vibrant colors and has a passion for aquatic pets.
participant_2.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

content.text: Hi! i am a dog person.
Wow, what else do you like?
I like to listen to music while i work at the grocery store.
I don't care what they say, they are the best band ever.
What do you think about ConvAI competition?
I really enjoy speaking with you and look forward to chatting again.
